name: Clash Crime-Real Gangster
description:
Clash Crime-Real Gangster is the best game of this year as the user is playing as the leading criminal who joins the mafia criminal gang. The user will start up as an escapee kid who is willing to make his name in the city. The kid joins the mafia gang and perform multiple missions step by step to earn money and success in this crime city.
Features:
• Incredible realistic graphics, character and vehicle models
• Enter and drive any in-game vehicle
• Gameplay optimized for touch screen devices
• Easy to use gameplay controls
• Hours of fun, entertaining gameplay
• Intense and fun missions
